name: SCShareableContent
desc: An object that represents a set of displays, apps, and windows that your app can capture.

items.name: class func getWithCompletionHandler((SCShareableContent?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves the displays, apps, and windows that your app can capture.

items.name: class func getExcludingDesktopWindows(Bool, onScreenWindowsOnly: Bool, completionHandler: (SCShareableContent?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves the displays, apps, and windows that match your criteria.

items.name: class func getExcludingDesktopWindows(Bool, onScreenWindowsOnlyAbove: SCWindow, completionHandler: (SCShareableContent?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves the displays, apps, and windows that are in front of the specified window.

items.name: class func getExcludingDesktopWindows(Bool, onScreenWindowsOnlyBelow: SCWindow, completionHandler: (SCShareableContent?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves the displays, apps, and windows that are behind the specified window.

items.name: var windows: [SCWindow]
items.desc: The windows that are available to capture.

items.name: var displays: [SCDisplay]
items.desc: The displays that are available to capture.

items.name: var applications: [SCRunningApplication]
items.desc: The apps that are available to capture.
